imdb.plot outline: Sorting through the best and worst viral videos is a big job; a big, horrible, mind-numbing job. Can you imagine having to do that yourself? Luckily, host Matt Arden and our crew of writers judge the bad videos so you don't have to. Every weekday on tbs.com you can find new episodes of Today's Riff, filled with hilarious clips and interviews with your favorite comedians. When a douchebag accidentally lights himself on fire, we'll be there. When a cat plays a keyboard, we'll be there. When a creepy infomercial haunts your dreams, we'll be there. We find it, mock it, and serve it up fresh every day. It's just what we do.
imdb.title: Today's Riff
plot: Sorting through the best and worst viral videos is a big job; a big, horrible, mind-numbing job. Can you imagine having to do that yourself? Luckily, host Matt Arden and our crew of writers judge the bad videos so you don't have to. Every weekday on tbs.com you can find new episodes of _Today's Riff_ (qv), filled with hilarious clips and interviews with your favorite comedians. When a douchebag accidentally lights himself on fire, we'll be there. When a cat plays a keyboard, we'll be there. When a creepy infomercial haunts your dreams, we'll be there. We find it, mock it, and serve it up fresh every day. It's just what we do.::Craig Kelly
